room.description: This is a template room, it isn't to be used in the game, but it just sits here for reference of new rooms.

room.basicinfo: A small room with a cot and a door
room.description: You woke from a deep slumber and got out of the cot, with no recollection of how you got here. A flourescent light casts shadows to the corners of the room. There is a door to the east.
